userreviews.userReview: Still getting betterI think this was my favorite one yet. I also appreciated the smaller number of typos and homonym mistakes. I gave book 4 a 5 because I experienced the "can't wait to turn the page" feeling a few times while reading it.

Excellent AdventureSteve and his crew are becoming quite the fighting unit. The addition of Daisy the dog, brings back their human side. There is lots of action and humor. I really enjoyed the book and look forward to the next adventure! If you haven't read the series get started!

description: Steve and crew have fought their way halfway across the country. They've faced Zombies, invading Koreans and their fellow Americans who are struggling to survive. This book in the series continues the journey and their mission to wreak havoc on the invaders and get the vengeance they so badly crave. As the old saying goes though, when you set-out to get revenge dig two graves...
title:
Reap What You Sow
      
          (Zournal #4)
